thread.title: Trespass Against Us exclusive: Michael Fassbender and Brendan Gleeson have heated exchange | London Evening Standard
thread.title_full: Trespass Against Us exclusive: Michael Fassbender and Brendan Gleeson have heated exchange | London Evening Standard

author: Emma Powell
title: Trespass Against Us exclusive: Michael Fassbender and Brendan Gleeson have heated exchange | London Evening Standard
text:
Behind the scenes on the set of La La Land 
Michael Fassbender and Brendan Gleeson look close to having a heated argument in an exclusive clip from upcoming film, Trespass Against Us. 
The Adam Smith directed film follows Chad Cutler (Fassbender) as he tries to leave the Irish travelling community and escape the criminal ways of his family. 
The one minute clip shows Chad discussing his future with his father Colby Cutler (Brendan Gleeson) as they take a dip in a swimming pool. 
Chad splashes his father as he gets frustrated with the life set out for him. Trespass Against Us - Trailer 
“The future is in the interweb, that’s where it’s all going,” he says. “The wise world business.” 
Quick to shut down his son’s dreams, Colby says: “No son of mine is about to start with any of that c***. Read more
